posts.post_content:
If anyone is interested, I would consider trading my Demmitt (St. Louis) for higher grade (PSA 6 or above) SLers I need (Old Mill backs only): J. Hart, Helm, Hickman, McCawley, Mullaney, Paige, Revelle, Seitz, and White. I would also consider T206 Cobbs, or combinations of SLers/Cobb. Please email if interested: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks for looking.

Cheers, Mike

Rats - fresh out of Old Mills and Cobbs.

Good luck, Mike.

Drat, Scott, but I thought you'd have what I want!

Cheers,
Mike
